headline: Does Nike (NKE) Still Justify Its Premium After Prolonged Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are wondering whether NIKE's current share price reflects its long term potential, this article walks through what that might look like using several valuation lenses. NIKE closed at US$62.70, with a 0.2% return over the past week, a 4.1% decline over 30 days, a 0.9% decline year to date, and share price declines of 10.5% over 1 year, 45.9% over 3 years and 53.1% over 5 years. Recent headlines around NIKE have focused on its brand strength, product pipeline and how it is positioning...
